thunder-lightning.name: Thunder & Lightning
thunder-lightning.description: 1993-94 Fleer Ultra insert set style. Electric gradient with cosmic nebulae and lightning bolts.

beam-team.name: Beam Team
beam-team.description: 1992-93 Stadium Club insert set style. Holographic prism borders with rainbow refraction.

metal-universe.name: Metal Universe
metal-universe.description: 1997-98 Fleer Metal Universe insert set style. Chrome/metallic finish with industrial aesthetic.

downtown.name: Downtown
downtown.description: Panini Donruss Optic insert style. Urban nightscape with neon city skyline.

kaboom.name: Kaboom!
kaboom.description: Panini Kaboom insert style. Comic book/pop art with bold outlines and explosive energy.

prizm-silver.name: Prizm Silver
prizm-silver.description: Panini Prizm Silver parallel style. Clean geometric patterns with silver shimmer.

hot-shots.name: Hot Shots
hot-shots.description: 1996-97 Flair Showcase Hot Shots die-cut insert style. Flames radiating from basketball, fire gradient, black void edges.

avoidWith.reason: Fire background + fire in pose = visual chaos. Use thunder-lightning or prizm-silver instead.

hot-shots.visualNote: This template has a busy fire background. Works best when the pose itself is clean/simple. Avoid combining with poses that already contain fire, torches, or crowd scenes.

thunder-lightning-rivalry.name: Thunder & Lightning: Rivalry
thunder-lightning-rivalry.description: Rivalry split card with purple/blue hero vs black/crimson villain, lightning VS divider.

beam-team-rivalry.name: Beam Team: Rivalry
beam-team-rivalry.description: Rivalry split card with pure prism hero vs corrupted spectrum villain, prismatic fracture divider.

metal-universe-rivalry.description: Rivalry split card with polished chrome hero vs rusted industrial villain, molten metal divider.

metal-universe-dark.name: Metal Universe: Dark Forge

spouse-blessing.name: Spouse Blessing

sibling-icon.name: Sibling Icon
sibling-icon.description: Byzantine diptych style with gold-ground mosaics and religious icon poses. Can show favor through halos on the righteous.
